name: sleep
desc: Sleep cures all! Why don't you catch some z's?

name: faith
desc: Are you spiritual? If so, you might want to consult a higher power

name: vent
desc: Venting to a loved one can take the edge off. If they will listen of course

name: pet
desc: Just 5 minutes with a pet can put a smile on your face

name: drive
desc: Long drives with some music can be very peaceful

name: nature
desc: Experiencing the wonders of nature can put things into perspective. Take a hike!

name: comedy
desc: Binging comedy on any streaming platform is a great move. It's hard to be sad while you're laughing

name: game
desc: Gaming can distract from a rough day. Something peaceful like Minecraft to wind down or break out your competitive side online

name: read
desc: When's the last time you sat down to read a good book? Get lost in some fiction or seek knowledge!

name: breathe
desc: Breathing exercises are a real thing! Backed by science, they calm down the body. Just breathe

name: walk
desc: A quick walk gives you time to cool off

name: self-care
desc: Look after you! Treat yourself to good food, retail therapy, or whatever makes you happy

name: socialize
desc: Even if you're sad, good friends don't let that last long. Go have some fun

name: exercise
desc: Blow off some steam! Exercise is one of the healthiest ways to do that

name: movie
desc: It's amazing how a good movie can distract the mind and relax the body

name: write
desc: Write down your frustrations. Documenting your thoughts can be very therapeuti

name: errands
desc: You probably have something that needs to be done. Boredom is a perfect opportunity to get it out of the way

name: yoga
desc: Yoga is physically challenging and mentally relaxing. Namaste!

name: meditate
desc: Mental exploration and visualization can be achieved through meditation. Take some time and just think

name: music
desc: Listen to music! Search for new tunes or bump the classics

name: bathe
desc: Either a quick shower or a long, relaxing bath. Getting clean just feels good

name: create
desc: Do whatever makes you feel creative! Paint, write music, build, draw... just create!
